metadata.title: CVE-2023-6371 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions before16.8.5, all versions starting from 16.9 before 16.9.3, all versionsstarting from 16.10 before 16.10.1. A wiki page with a crafted payload maylead to a Stored XSS, allowing attackers to perform arbitrary actions onbehalf of victims.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
